attributes.action: End BBC Liberal Bias In Reporting Political News
attributes.additional_details: Whilst Daily Politics, This Week and Question Time are fairly balanced the major News programmes (i.e. six o clock and ten o clock news) are consistently reporting with a strong anti Brexit bias.
attributes.background: Whenever an opportunity arises the BBC reporting on almost any significant economic or social event happening in the UK, or indeed abroad, is delivered with a negative slant against Brexit. This is resulting in the BBC trying to influence the news rather than fairly reporting it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. The BBC is already an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of government and parliament. The Charter also includes rules on impartiality. 

If you wish to make a complaint about bias you can find out about how to do so here: 

http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/our_work/complaints_and_appeals/

You may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/179823
